{"id":1269134718,"question_id":2878,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1716791772,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1269134718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Apply Operations to Make All Array Elements Equal to Zero","memory":"60.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkArray(int[] nums, int k) {\n\n        if(k==1) return true; //k==1特例\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n\n        int[] diff = new int[len+1];\n\n        int base = 0 ;\n        for(int i=0; i<len-1; i++){\n            \n            base += diff[i];\n            if(base>nums[i]) return false; // why ??\n\n            int delta = nums[i] - base;\n\n            if(delta > 0 && i+k<len){\n                diff[i] += delta;\n                diff[i+k] -= delta;\n            }\n            \n            base += delta;\n        }\n\n        return base + diff[len-1] == nums[len-1];\n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"apply-operations-to-make-all-array-elements-equal-to-zero","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
